[[File:Welcome to the.png|link=Project:Community Portal|210px|Welcome]][[File:Blank.png|9px|link=]]
[[File:PokeClickerLogo.png|link=Project:About|300px|Pokéclicker Wiki]]
[[File:Wiki_Custom.png|link=|80px]]
[[File:PC_E.png|80px|left|link=]][[File:PC_E.png|right|80px|link=]] A community-driven wiki focusing on [[PokéClicker|Pokéclicker]] that [[Help:Editing|anyone with a confirmed Miraheze account can edit]].
Today is {{CURRENTDAYNAME}} {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}} at {{CURRENTTIME}}.
The wiki currently has [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:Allpages|articles]] since May 31, 2008.
There is a total of {{NUMBEROFACTIVEUSERS}} active users this month.
Note: Auto-Confirmed accounts are those that have both existed for 4 days and edited pages 10 times. Contact the Wiki Moderators for more information. ---- [[Wikia:Help:How_to_create_a_great_guide_or_tutorial|Wiki tutorial]]{{·}} [[:Category:Help|Help pages]]{{·}} [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord]{{·}} [[PokéClicker Wiki:Directory|Directory]]
[[PokéClicker Wiki:Ruleset|Ruleset and guidelines]]{{·}} [[Special:SpecialPages|Special pages]]{{·}} [[Special:Categories|Categories]]{{·}} [[Special:Preferences|Preferences]]{{·}} [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] ----

Pokéclicker is an open source game built around the story and content of the Pokémon games. This is a idle & clicker type game that is currently in beta release phase. New content and patches are released frequently.

----

Pokémon is sole property of Nintendo and we do not claim to have any ownership of the same.

---- You can start browsing this wiki by scrolling below and clicking on any of the links. == '''Maps & Navigation''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Regions]] !! [[Dungeons]] !! [[Gyms]] !! [[Towns & Cities]] !! [[Underground]] |- ! [[Shops]] !! [[NPCs]] !! [[Farm]] !! [[Safari Zone]] !! [[Battle Frontier]] |} == '''Items''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Key Items]] !! [[Oak Items]] !! [[Shops|Shop Items]] !! [[Underground#Items|Underground Items]] !! [[Evolution Items]] |- ! [[Pokéballs]] !! [[Battle Items]] !! [[Egg|Eggs]] !! [[Berries]] & [[Farm Items]] !! [[Rare Hold Items]] |} == '''Currencies''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[Poké Dollar]] !! [[Dungeon Tokens]] !! [[Quest Points]] |- ! [[Farming Points|Farm Points]] !! [[Diamonds]] !! [[Battle Points]] |} == '''Pokémon and Mechanics''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [[List of Obtainable Pokémon]] !! [[Baby Pokémon]] !! [[Pokémon with Alternate Forms]] !! [[Events|Event Pokémon]] |- ! [[Shard-Type Advantages]] !! [[Shards]] !! [[Protein|Proteins]] !! [[Weather]] |- ! [[Pokémon Day Care]] !! [[Shiny Chance]] !! colspan=2|[[Roaming Pokémon]] |} == '''Guides, Calculators, Statistics, and Miscellaneous Information''' == {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto;" ! [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] !! [[Help:FAQ|FAQ]] !! [[Speedruns]] !! [[Challenge Mode]] !! [[Shortcut Keys|Keyboard Shortcuts]] |- ! [[Route Statistics]] !! [[Pokémon Statistics]] !! colspan=2|[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PqL4TNH61Bo1t0hG5TBbvOMavPU6D3EzbKnUNXxjqUk/edit?usp=sharing Shiny Breeding Rate Calculator] !! [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1TE5cAKSlA7TAliA001_mIiO1odZ6e4yUEMre0GBW1to/edit?usp=sharing Farm Walkthrough] |- ! colspan=5|[[Pokémon Day Care]] & [[Shiny Chance]] (Farm Breeding Strategies) |}
Meet the [[Pokéclicker Team]]!

'''Didn't find the page you were looking for? try looking at this list of all [[Special:Statistics|'''{{NUMBEROFARTICLES}}''']] [[Special:AllPages|pages]]''' This wiki is community managed but we do try to keep a [[To-Do list]] of what is missing or needs updating on this wiki. Please let us know on [https://discord.gg/a6DFe4p Discord] if you see anything that needs updating on a page or simply add it in the [[To-Do list]]. Thank you.

__NOTOC__ __NOEDITSECTION__

revision.comment: Removing the Staff sidebar, it is too long and needs its own page. Or at least belongs at the bottom of the page. Removing it for now and going to link it somewhere after the page is done
